all_response:
Jax: You won't survive the race, let alone win it if you're not prepared. To give yourself a chance you'll need to wear specialized swimwear, and use the right swimming style.
Jax: You need to go to the store to buy a dark swimsuit and a high-performance swim cap.
Jax: Dark swimsuits are sold at the All Terrain Swimwear Store.
Jax: High-performance swim caps are sold at the The Very Best Aquatics Store.
Jax: Ferocious creatures lurk at the bottom of Murky Lake. But, their eyes cannot see very well, if you swim with a breaststroke then you will move in a way similar to them and they won't attack you.

all_response:
Jax: To take part in the badminton matches with your opponents, you first need to purchase a badminton racket. Then you can challenge your opponents at their venue of choice. They are all strong badminton players but each have different weaknesses in their playing style. You will need to use different play techniques to overcome each of them.
Jax: Only the Atlantic Sports Store has badminton rackets for sale currently.
Jax: When playing against Oleg, you should use a high lob to counter.

Jax: To take part in the badminton match, you first need to to buy a badminton racket from the store, then you can head to the gym to challenge your opponent. Doriya is a good badminton player but they have poor form for responding to the powerful smash technique. You will need to learn this technique to challenge Doriya.
Jax: Only the Atlantic Sports Store has badminton rackets for sale currently.
Jax: I remember that only Ms. Anna was still teaching the powerful smash stunt in badminton.
Jax: Teacher Anna works at the Blue Lake Sports School.
Jax: The school does not admit students, but you can find a way to have the teacher teach you individually after class. I heard that the teacher Anna at their school wants a signed photo of her idol football star, and if you give her the signed photo, she will definitely agree to teach you.
Jax: Anna's after a signed photo of football star Ali Goldenboot.
Jax: Doriya is waiting for you at the Sicily Sports Stadium.
